name: HSP_CLP_CMS_LINE_DX
description: This table contains linkages between service lines and diagnoses for Hospital Billing claims.

columns.name: CLAIM_PRINT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: LINE_DX_SVC_LINE
columns.description: The claim line number for a service line - diagnosis relationship.

columns.name: LINE_DX_PIECE
columns.description: The piece number for a service line - diagnosis relationship.

columns.name: LINE_DX_POINTER
columns.description: The diagnosis pointer from a single piece of a service line - diagnosis relationship.
